languages.text: {n}Друкари демонстрирует белесую личинку — ту самую, которую вы видели в руках Маражая. Конечности-инструменты на ваших глазах начинают стремительный акт препарации — плоть личинки лопается под когтем-скальпелем, распускается мерзким слизистым цветком. Тягучая речь ксеноса вызывает неприятный диссонанс с суетливыми движениями его конечностей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари демонстрирует белесую личинку — ту самую, которую вы видели в руках Маражая. Конечности-инструменты на ваших глазах начинают стремительный акт препарации — плоть личинки лопается под когтем-скальпелем, распускается мерзким слизистым цветком. Тягучая речь ксеноса вызывает неприятный диссонанс с суетливыми движениями его конечностей.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot, the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. As you watch, the tool appendages perform a swift dissection: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and blossoms into a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speaking creates an unnerving dissonance with the frantic movements of his limbs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари демонстрирует белесую личинку — ту самую, которую вы видели в руках Маражая. Конечности-инструменты на ваших глазах начинают стремительный акт препарации — плоть личинки лопается под когтем-скальпелем, распускается мерзким слизистым цветком. Тягучая речь ксеноса вызывает неприятный диссонанс с суетливыми движениями его конечностей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot — the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. The tool appendages perform a swift dissection before your eyes: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and opens like a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speech is in unnerving contrast to the bustling movements of his limbs.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot — the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. The tool appendages perform a swift dissection before your eyes: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and opens like a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speech is in unnerving contrast to the bustling movements of his limbs.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot, the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. As you watch, the tool appendages perform a swift dissection: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and blossoms into a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speaking creates an unnerving dissonance with the frantic movements of his limbs.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari soulève un ver de couleur pâle, semblable à celui que vous aviez vu entre les mains de Marazhai. Ses membres effectuent une rapide dissection sous vos yeux : un coup de griffe aussi tranchante qu'un scalpel fait éclater la chair de l'asticot, comme un bourgeon qui éclorait pour former une fleur gluante et repoussante. Le ton posé du xénos contraste de manière dérangeante avec les mouvements frénétiques de ses membres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot, the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. As you watch, the tool appendages perform a swift dissection: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and blossoms into a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speaking creates an unnerving dissonance with the frantic movements of his limbs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari soulève un ver de couleur pâle, semblable à celui que vous aviez vu entre les mains de Marazhai. Ses membres effectuent une rapide dissection sous vos yeux : un coup de griffe aussi tranchante qu'un scalpel fait éclater la chair de l'asticot, comme un bourgeon qui éclorait pour former une fleur gluante et repoussante. Le ton posé du xénos contraste de manière dérangeante avec les mouvements frénétiques de ses membres.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}这个黑暗灵族举起了手中苍白的蛆虫，这只蛆虫正是你之前在玛拉斋手中看到的那条。在你的注视下，他的工具附肢迅速对虫子进行了解剖。蛆虫的肉在他手术刀般的爪子下爆开，变成了一朵粘稠的血肉之花，令人作呕。这个异形缓慢的说话方式与他四肢的疯狂动作，构成了令人不安的不谐景象。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot, the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. As you watch, the tool appendages perform a swift dissection: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and blossoms into a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speaking creates an unnerving dissonance with the frantic movements of his limbs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个黑暗灵族举起了手中苍白的蛆虫，这只蛆虫正是你之前在玛拉斋手中看到的那条。在你的注视下，他的工具附肢迅速对虫子进行了解剖。蛆虫的肉在他手术刀般的爪子下爆开，变成了一朵粘稠的血肉之花，令人作呕。这个异形缓慢的说话方式与他四肢的疯狂动作，构成了令人不安的不谐景象。{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari hält die blasse Made hoch — dieselbe, die du in Marazhais Händen gesehen hast. Du siehst zu, wie die Werkzeuggliedmaßen die Made schnell sezieren. Ihr Fleisch platzt unter den skalpellartigen Klauen auf und erblüht zu einer widerlichen, schleimigen Blume. Die langsame Sprechweise des Xenos bildet eine verstörende Dissonanz mit den hektischen Bewegungen seiner Glieder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot, the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. As you watch, the tool appendages perform a swift dissection: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and blossoms into a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speaking creates an unnerving dissonance with the frantic movements of his limbs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari hält die blasse Made hoch — dieselbe, die du in Marazhais Händen gesehen hast. Du siehst zu, wie die Werkzeuggliedmaßen die Made schnell sezieren. Ihr Fleisch platzt unter den skalpellartigen Klauen auf und erblüht zu einer widerlichen, schleimigen Blume. Die langsame Sprechweise des Xenos bildet eine verstörende Dissonanz mit den hektischen Bewegungen seiner Glieder.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari sujeta la pálida larva, la misma que viste en las manos de Marazhai. Mientras lo observas, los instrumentos de sus apéndices realizan una rápida disección: la carne de la larva estalla al clavarle la garra con forma de escalpelo y florece en una repugnante y viscosa flor. La pausada forma de hablar del xenos crea una perturbadora disonancia con los frenéticos movimientos de sus extremidades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot, the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. As you watch, the tool appendages perform a swift dissection: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and blossoms into a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speaking creates an unnerving dissonance with the frantic movements of his limbs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari sujeta la pálida larva, la misma que viste en las manos de Marazhai. Mientras lo observas, los instrumentos de sus apéndices realizan una rápida disección: la carne de la larva estalla al clavarle la garra con forma de escalpelo y florece en una repugnante y viscosa flor. La pausada forma de hablar del xenos crea una perturbadora disonancia con los frenéticos movimientos de sus extremidades.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは青白いウジ虫を手に取る。マラズハイの手に握られていたのものと同じものだ。道具の付属物が素早く解剖を行っていく。ウジ虫の肉は外科用のメスのような爪の下で破裂し、気持ちの悪いヌメッた花を咲かせる。異種族のゆっくりとした話し方は、彼の手足の必死の動きと不穏な不協和音を生み出している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot, the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. As you watch, the tool appendages perform a swift dissection: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and blossoms into a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speaking creates an unnerving dissonance with the frantic movements of his limbs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは青白いウジ虫を手に取る。マラズハイの手に握られていたのものと同じものだ。道具の付属物が素早く解剖を行っていく。ウジ虫の肉は外科用のメスのような爪の下で破裂し、気持ちの悪いヌメッた花を咲かせる。異種族のゆっくりとした話し方は、彼の手足の必死の動きと不穏な不協和音を生み出している。{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, Marazhai'ın ellerinde gördüğüyle aynı olan solgun kurdu gösteriyor. Sen izlerken gereç şeklindeki uzantıları, hızlı bir diseksiyon yapıyor: Kurdun bedeni, neşter benzeri pençelerin altında yarılıyor ve mide bulandırıcı, vıcık vıcık bir çiçek gibi açılıyor. Zenonun yavaş konuşma biçimi, uzuvlarının hızlı hareketleriyle rahatsız edici bir tezat oluşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari holds up the pale maggot, the same one you saw in Marazhai's hands. As you watch, the tool appendages perform a swift dissection: the maggot's flesh bursts under the scalpel-like claw and blossoms into a disgusting, slimy flower. The xenos's slow manner of speaking creates an unnerving dissonance with the frantic movements of his limbs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari, Marazhai'ın ellerinde gördüğünün aynısı olan solgun kurdu gösteriyor. Sen izlerken gereç şeklindeki uzantıları hızlı bir diseksiyon yapıyor: Kurdun bedeni, neşter benzeri pençelerin altında yarılıyor ve mide bulandırıcı, vıcık vıcık bir çiçek gibi açılıyor. Zenonun yavaş konuşma biçimi, uzuvlarının hızlı hareketleriyle rahatsız edici bir tezat meydana getiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
